document.full_text: a yemeni man yelled "god is greatest" in arabic as he tried to barge into the cockpit of an american airlines flight over the weekend, a federal prosecutor told a judge in the case on tuesday.
document.title: yemeni man yelled "god is greatest" on flight: prosecutor
lines_and_colors: a yemeni man yelled "god is greatest" in arabic as he tried to barge into the cockpit of an american airlines flight over the weekend, a federal prosecutor told a judge in the case on tuesday.
